intent.name: managedTransaction
intent.description: Used to indicate a component runs in a managed transaction.

intent.name: propagatesTransaction
intent.description: Used to indicate a service or reference propogates the transaction

intent.name: suspendsTransaction
intent.description: Used to indicate a service or reference suspends the transaction

intent.name: transactedOneWay
intent.description: Indicates the reference will include one way invocation in the transaction or include message receipt on a service in a transaction.

intent.name: transactedOneWay.global
intent.description: Qualifies transactedOneWay to use global transactions.

intent.name: transactedOneWay.local
intent.description: Qualifies transactedOneWay to use local transactions.

intent.name: authentication
intent.description: Inidicates the client needs to authenticate before interaction.

intent.name: authentication.message
intent.description: Inidicates the client needs to message level authenticate before interaction.

intent.name: confidentiality.message
intent.description: Inidicates the interaction needs message level confidentiality.

intent.name: integrity.message
intent.description: Inidicates the interaction needs message level integrity.

intent.name: authentication.transport
intent.description: Inidicates the client needs to transport level authenticate before interaction.

intent.name: confidentiality.transport
intent.description: Inidicates the interaction needs transport level confidentiality.

intent.name: integrity.transport
intent.description: Inidicates the interaction needs transport level integrity.
